fields.name: AccountName
fields.description: The name of the account that is set as the default.

fields.name: ResourceGroupName
fields.description: The resource group name of the account that is set as the default.

fields.name: Scope
fields.description: The scope object ID. For example, sub ID or tenant ID.

fields.name: ScopeTenantId
fields.description: The scope tenant in which the default account is set.

fields.name: ScopeType
fields.description: The scope where the default account is set.

fields.name: SubscriptionId
fields.description: The subscription ID of the account that is set as the default.
